verses.roman:
jagannātha āliṅgite calilā dhāñā
mandire paḍilā preme āviṣṭa hañā

synonyms: jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; āliṅgite—to embrace; calilā—went; dhāñā—very swiftly; mandire—in the temple; paḍilā—fell down; preme—in ecstasy; āviṣṭa—overwhelmed; hañā—becoming.
translation: Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went swiftly to embrace Lord Jagannātha, but when He entered the temple, He was so overwhelmed with love of Godhead that He fainted on the floor.
